mapper.select: select code, name from dictionary where type = #{type};
select code, value, parent_code as parentCode, sequence, used from dictionary where parent_code = #{parentCode} and code = #{code}
mapper.update: update dictionary set value = #{dict.value}, sequence = #{dict.sequence}, used = #{dict.used} where code = #{dict.code} and parent_code = #{dict.parentCode}
mapper.delete: delete from dictionary where code = #{dict.code} and parent_code = #{dict.parentCode}
mapper.insert: insert into dictionary (code, parent_code, value, sequence, used) values(#{dict.code}, #{dict.parentCode}, #{dict.value}, #{dict.sequence}, #{dict.used})
